resources.string: Or enter a Senator\'s last name
Or enter a state abbreviation (for list of Senators)
Or enter a Representative\'s last name
Or enter a state abbreviation (for list of Representatives)
We\'re sorry an error has been encountered.\n Please check your internet connection try again.

Sorry, no response from server. 
Check that you have entered the data in the correct format.
 Two letter abbreviation for state.
 5 digit number for ZIP code.
 The last name is spelled correctly.
